thread.section_title: The Galveston County Daily News - sports
thread.title: Heisman hype hits Houston

author: ANTHONY OPPERMANN
title: Heisman hype hits Houston
text:
Historic Galveston Downtown Partnership to honor former mayor 
Join the Historic Galveston Downtown Partnership Oct. 29 to honor former Mayor Lyda Ann Thomas for her lifelong community service and the inaugural presentation of the Lyda Ann Thomas Downtown Advocate Award. This is to be awarded to a deserving individual for their commitment and support for the progress of Historic Downtown Galveston. The event will be at The Grand 1894 Opera House with presentations, a reception with cocktails and Hors d'ouevres. Tickets are $75 for members, $100 for non members, and all the proceeds goes to the The Downtown Partnership's Advocacy Program. For seats and deets, visit www.downtowngalveston.org or call 409-789-9820.
